comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: In 1915, according to Wikipedia articel, "The offices of the Labour Leader were raided in August 1915 and Brockway was charged with publishing seditious material. " According to www.spartacus.schoolnet.co.uk/TUbrockway.htm he was a conscientious objector and argued against conscription (like the draft for the Vietnam War). He lived to a ripe old age - 99 . His papers were left to Churchill College, Cambridge (UK). More details at janus.lib.cam.ac.uk/db/node.xsp?id=EAD%2FGBR%2F0014%2FFEBR
